comments:
We have to ensure that we are flushing sync info when projects deleted,
subscriber cancelled, error conditions:

An additional requirement is the proper reset after changes to the local
workspace. When a file is merged, it is marked as such so it no longer appears
in the view. Some operations, such as a Replace with HEAD, will invalidate the
previous merge. We need to determine how to properly hanlde this.
